name: Total War: Rome II
description:
Total War: Rome II is a strategy game developed by Creative Assembly. It came out on 03-09-2013. SEGA published the game. Total War: Rome II has a Metascore of 76, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Total War: Rome II on PC.
Richard Beddow scored the game.
